title: JADE Allowed Atomic Actions v1
description: The complete list of atomic actions permitted in JADE skills. Any action not on this list is ILLEGAL and will be rejected by the validator. This is the 'periodic table' of agent operations.

network.description: Network operations - all subject to network_whitelist enforcement

http_get.description: Perform an HTTP GET request to a whitelisted URL

check_mm.description: Translate text between languages using free translation APIs with fallback

check_safe.description: Execute a command on a remote server via SSH proxy API
